name: Color Drop Master
description:
Color Drop: the color arcade game! Match the color and show your ability. Simple and addictive metchanics in this color match game!

Special Features
Multiplayer! - show your skills
Challenge Friends - share your score online!
Achievements - unlock new levels
Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

Color drop is completely free to play! Enjoy!

Hello color lovers! This one is a big one! A lot of new features just for you:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
